page.title: 18A day at school:EMMA/2.
page.content: After eating my sandwiches and chocolate bar.I go out and play on the school field,with a group from my class.1:05pm.Bell goes.First afternoon lesson being the "Music Workshop",radio programme.I help to distribute instruments and percussion. Today I play the drum.We all sing and play along with the radio,it is very enjoyable.After programme I join my computer group and load my favourite programme;wordworm.We carry on upto playtime. 2:20pm.Playtime.Today I play in the large trees at the edge of the playground.2:35pm.We change for games and assemble ready for netball.There are only a small group of us today,so we practise our passing and running skills.3:25pm.We change again and at 3:30pm.Are dismissed,after prayers.
